segments.text: I notice the girl standing next to the boy, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent and hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see her reaching out, expecting him to give her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows how dangerous it is for him to be up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely unaware of the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad that she might get hurt if the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both stay safe and don't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so tense, yet she seems so happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit worried for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should tell them to be more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR
